backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining state, data types, access control, storage mixins, and user/test bench/document management structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented features, linked files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend source files with short descriptive summaries for each file’s purpose.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Production deployment checklist for Draft Version 36 outlining required environment checks and deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md: Documentation of required production environment variables and their usage for the frontend.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Smoke test script for validating core functionality after deploying Draft Version 36 to production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures public and protected route trees, authentication gates, global providers, and selects the router based on the current path.
Checks if the user is an admin and either renders children or shows a permissions error screen.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Implements a global React error boundary that displays an alert and reload option when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures a backend actor is available, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Manages Internet Identity auth state, redirecting unauthenticated users and providing sign‑in UI.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Renders a draggable list UI and delegates drag events for item reordering.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Provides hook logic for drag‑and‑drop item reordering with state tracking.
Defines the main application layout with navigation, theming, admin links, and sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows floating buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Provides an entity tag input with suggestions, tag removal, and keyboard handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid-based selector that displays predefined avatars and lets users choose one via button clicks.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom images with cache-busting and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Zustand store providing a timestamp value to force avatar image cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Manages dashboard chart type state and persists it to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing identities via AuthClient.
Periodically calls updateLastSeen on the backend when a valid actor and identity exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, test benches, and settings.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Initializes and manages the app’s language preference from localStorage or backend and exposes it via context.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helper functions for validating and displaying language metadata.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines a large union type of all translation keys used across the app.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Provides a hook that returns the active language, setters, loading state, and a translation function.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark CSS variables for theme colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin page with tabs for benches, documents, and users using translated labels.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all benches, supports deletion with confirmation, and shows relevant loading and empty states.
Lists documents with metadata and allows downloading them with success and error handling.
Shows the current user's profile, expiration preferences, and dashboard layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays detailed bench info with editing, component management, deletion, history, and threshold logic.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays a searchable list of test benches with filtering, loading states, and an option to open the add-bench modal.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new test bench, including photo upload, tags, documents, components, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editable table for adding, modifying, and removing bench components with expiration status handling.
Manages bench documents, including upload, association, deletion, and category-based organization.
Renders a chronological history of bench actions with user info and timestamps.
Displays a bench photo with loading and error fallback behavior.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Manages a list of document categories with selectable types and file uploads, supporting adding, removing, and versioning files.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog to duplicate a component to multiple benches, handling selection, mutation, validation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details including metadata, URLs, tags, and photo upload with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Provides a tag entry UI allowing adding, removing, and selecting tags from suggestions with filtering.
Placeholder page describing planned features for creating new test benches.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Displays a pie chart summarizing components by expiration status across benches using thresholds and i18n labels.
Renders a bar chart per bench showing counts of components by expiration status using localized labels and thresholds.
Builds a bar chart showing component counts by expiration date ranges and displays a fallback message when no data is available.
Aggregates documents by category and renders a pie chart with color‑coded segments or a no‑data message.
Groups component expirations by month and displays them as either a bar or line chart depending on the selected chart type.
Computes expired component counts per bench based on user threshold settings and visualizes the results using a bar or line chart.
Calculates overall component health percentages (ok, expiring soon, expired) and shows them as progress bars.
Defines a reorderable set of statistic and chart cards for the dashboard, including totals and criticality metrics.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that loads benches, components, documents, and user settings, computes status metrics, and renders charts and sections accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to edit personal info, avatar, language, and expiration preferences with backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity, showing login status, errors, and redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Users/UserProfileDeta: Displays public details of a user by principal ID, handling loading, invalid IDs, and missing profiles.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Defines predefined avatar image paths and utilities to retrieve avatar IDs and paths.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts the default test bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by generating a temporary URL and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error formats into user‑friendly messages with special handling for common backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold logic with localStorage fallback and utilities for per‑bench threshold evaluation.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique ID using timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Cleans and normalizes bench descriptions by fixing capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against name, codes, description, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with fallback, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements basic validators for emails, domain-restricted emails, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and optional URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Specifies TypeScript config for Node-focused builds, including module settings and included Vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite setup with React, environment variable injection, path aliasing, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and schema state for the public user profile view work.
